text: Abnormal temperature increase was detected in the hydraulic pump. The sealing component showed signs of leakage. The seal was replaced and the pump was tested successfully.
During routine inspection, vibration was observed in the cooling fan. The fan blade component was misaligned. Alignment adjustment was performed and the equipment returned to normal operation.
The conveyor motor produced abnormal noise during startup. Inspection found bearing wear and insufficient lubrication. Lubrication was applied and the motor was restarted.
